Abhorrent Cologne.name: Abhorrent Cologne
Abhorrent Cologne.description: Enemies have less health, but enemy damage is increased!

Absorption Coil.name: Absorption Coil
Absorption Coil.description: A percentage of damage taken charges your signature arcana!

Agni's Sparkler.name: Agni's Sparkler
Agni's Sparkler.description: Increases ferocity of your burn status effects!

Alchemist's Stone.name: Alchemist's Stone
Alchemist's Stone.description: All Chaos Gems gained during the Chaos Trials are transmuted into gold!

Anchor of Burden.name: Anchor of Burden
Anchor of Burden.description: Damage and stuns are increased but movement speed is reduced for each cursed relic owned!

Ancient Fountain Pen.name: Ancient Fountain Pen
Ancient Fountain Pen.description: Your charged signature arcana deals more damage every time you use it!

Antiquated Tabi.name: Antiquated Tabi
Antiquated Tabi.description: Adds a small chance to evade attacks!

Arcana Rewards Card.name: Arcana Rewards Card
Arcana Rewards Card.description: All gold costs for arcana are discounted!

Armor of Greed.name: Armor of Greed
Armor of Greed.description: Grants a significant boost in armor! Every hit taken reduces gold count.

Armor of Resolve.name: Armor of Resolve
Armor of Resolve.description: Increases armor while at low health!

Auditor's Talisman.name: Auditor's Talisman
Auditor's Talisman.description: Increases critical hit chance at low health!

Auger of Poetry.name: Auger of Poetry
Auger of Poetry.description: Increases resistance to earth based attacks!

Autograph Pad.name: Autograph Pad
Autograph Pad.description: Damage and movement speed is increased while signature arcana is charged!

Berserker's Axe.name: Berserker's Axe
Berserker's Axe.description: Increases damage dealt for a short while after taking damage!

Berserker's Helm.name: Berserker's Helm
Berserker's Helm.description: Damage increased while at low health!

Bladed Buckler.name: Bladed Buckler
Bladed Buckler.description: Destroying an enemy projectile grants signature charge energy!

Blasting Sprite Aura.name: Blasting Sprite Aura
Blasting Sprite Aura.description: Summons a sprite that slows enemies! Only one sprite can be active at any time.

Boots of Frenzy.name: Boots of Frenzy
Boots of Frenzy.description: Defeating enemies grants a chance to temporarily add unlimited charges to your movement arcana!

Bracers of the Beast.name: Bracers of the Beast
Bracers of the Beast.description: Pressing forward into an attack immediately before impact allows you to guard the attack!

Broken Plague Flask.name: Broken Plague Flask
Broken Plague Flask.description: Enemy max health is lowered, but your health is lowered as well!

C-99 Piggy Bank.name: C-99 Piggy Bank
C-99 Piggy Bank.description: Gets heavier as you progress through the trials. Drop from inventory to open.

Calcifying Bonemail.name: Calcifying Bonemail
Calcifying Bonemail.description: Increases armor for a short duration after taking damage!

Calvin's Sandy Shoes.name: Calvin's Sandy Shoes
Calvin's Sandy Shoes.description: Adds a chance to evade while at low health!

Captain's Ring.name: Captain's Ring
Captain's Ring.description: Equipping arcana of differing elements increases damage!

Cartographer's Quill.name: Cartographer's Quill
Cartographer's Quill.description: Increases damage based on how much of the map you have revealed! Damage increase lasts for the entire trial!

Chaos Scanner.name: Chaos Scanner
Chaos Scanner.description: Reveals health bars for all enemies in the Chaos Trials!

Charming Teddy Bear.name: Charming Teddy Bear
Charming Teddy Bear.description: Adds a chance to charm enemies when taking damage!

Cobalt Firestone.name: Cobalt Firestone
Cobalt Firestone.description: Summons an aura that damages nearby enemies!

Combo Gloves.name: Combo Gloves
Combo Gloves.description: Basic arcana have an extra combo!

Conqueror's Belt.name: Conqueror's Belt
Conqueror's Belt.description: All Rogues and Archers have their spells limited! Only one Conqueror item can be in effect at a time.

Conqueror's Cloak.name: Conqueror's Cloak
Conqueror's Cloak.description: All Mages and Summoners have their spells limited! Only one Conqueror item can be in effect at a time.

Conqueror's Helmet.name: Conqueror's Helmet
Conqueror's Helmet.description: All Knights and Lancers have their spells limited! Only one Conqueror item can be in effect at a time.

Covert Ops Mask.name: Covert Ops Mask
Covert Ops Mask.description: After evading an attack, all of your attacks will be critical hits for a short duration!

Crimson Clover.name: Crimson Clover
Crimson Clover.description: Critical hit chance is increased for you and all enemies!

Critical Placebos.name: Critical Placebos
Critical Placebos.description: Makes you believe all your attacks result in critical hits!

Cushioned Flip-flops.name: Cushioned Flip-flops
Cushioned Flip-flops.description: Damage taken is expended from your signature meter while you have sufficient charge to shield the attack!

Dagger of Midas.name: Dagger of Midas
Dagger of Midas.description: Increases damage based on how much gold you currently have!

Dark Katana.name: Dark Katana
Dark Katana.description: Designed by Artisan Mathosse Feadur, this relic triples the critical hit chance for all melee arcana!

Dated Sunglasses.name: Dated Sunglasses
Dated Sunglasses.description: Enemy projectiles move slower, giving you more time to react!

Deafening Cymbals.name: Deafening Cymbals
Deafening Cymbals.description: Destroys all projectiles in the area when hit by a projectile!

Demi's Teapot.name: Demi's Teapot
Demi's Teapot.description: Increases the duration of buff arcana!

Devi's Bug Spray.name: Devi's Bug Spray
Devi's Bug Spray.description: Increases potency of your poison status effects!

Dice of the Nemesis.name: Dice of the Nemesis
Dice of the Nemesis.description: Adds a small chance of dealing massive damage with your critical hits!

Double Edged Cestus.name: Double Edged Cestus
Double Edged Cestus.description: Increase basic arcana damage! All other damage decreased.

Double Toil.name: Double Toil
Double Toil.description: Reduces cooldowns by half but receive double damage!

Double Trouble.name: Double Trouble
Double Trouble.description: Deal double damage but receive double damage!

Ebon Wolf's Cloak.name: Ebon Wolf's Cloak
Ebon Wolf's Cloak.description: Increases fire and lightning arcana damage, but receive more damage from water and earth attacks!

Elemental Pointes.name: Elemental Pointes
Elemental Pointes.description: Using a dash arcana immediately after another arcana lowers cooldowns for all arcana of the same element as your dash!

Elven Ears.name: Elven Ears
Elven Ears.description: Remaining motionless for a short time causes you to disappear from sight!

Equestricap.name: Equestricap
Equestricap.description: Designed by Artisan Tacobowl8, this relic allows you to look quite dashing as you gallop to max speed with ease!

Evening Gloves.name: Evening Gloves
Evening Gloves.description: Basic arcana chains are completed automatically!

Flak Gauntlet.name: Flak Gauntlet
Flak Gauntlet.description: Allows you to destroy enemy projectiles with melee basic arcana!

Flashy Boots.name: Flashy Boots
Flashy Boots.description: Allows you to triple dash but lowers movement speed!

Fortune Cookie.name: Fortune Cookie
Fortune Cookie.description: Randomly empowers an arcana at the beginning of each stage!

Freezing Sprite Naya.name: Freezing Sprite Naya
Freezing Sprite Naya.description: Summons a sprite that freezes enemies! Only one sprite can be active at any time.

Friendship Bracelet.name: Friendship Bracelet
Friendship Bracelet.description: Increase damage and movement speed when you're with a true friend!

Glass Cannon.name: Glass Cannon
Glass Cannon.description: Damage increased but max health is reduced!

Glove of Midas.name: Glove of Midas
Glove of Midas.description: Increase gold gain for all wizards! Multiple gloves do not stack.

Golden Armor of Envy.name: Golden Armor of Envy
Golden Armor of Envy.description: Increases armor but store prices are increased!

Golden Saber of Envy.name: Golden Saber of Envy
Golden Saber of Envy.description: Increases damage but store prices are increased!

Greased Boots.name: Greased Boots
Greased Boots.description: Increases the distances traveled by dash arcana!

Grimoire of Ruin.name: Grimoire of Ruin
Grimoire of Ruin.description: Increases the damage of summoned agents!

Health Care Card.name: Health Care Card
Health Care Card.description: Receive a discount whenever you purchase potions from the merchant!

Heavy Travel Jacket.name: Heavy Travel Jacket
Heavy Travel Jacket.description: Increases armor for each relic held!

Horned Halo.name: Horned Halo
Horned Halo.description: Revive with low health when defeated but consumes half of current health when picked up! This relic is destroyed on use.

Hunter's Stiletto.name: Hunter's Stiletto
Hunter's Stiletto.description: Increase damage against foes that are inflicted with a status ailment.

Hyperbolic Train.name: Hyperbolic Train
Hyperbolic Train.description: Signature charges faster at low health!

Idealist's Mirror.name: Idealist's Mirror
Idealist's Mirror.description: All arcana are empowered when at full health!

Igniting Sprite Vesa.name: Igniting Sprite Vesa
Igniting Sprite Vesa.description: Summons a sprite that burns enemies! Only one sprite can be active at any time.

Indra's Copper Pipe.name: Indra's Copper Pipe
Indra's Copper Pipe.description: Increases duration of your shock status effects!

Infinity Marble.name: Infinity Marble
Infinity Marble.description: Signature charge stays active until used!

Insignia of Legend.name: Insignia of Legend
Insignia of Legend.description: A crest presented only to those who have cleared the Chaos Trials!

Jewelry Box.name: Jewelry Box
Jewelry Box.description: Picking up chaos gems heals for a small amount. Excludes gems collected from Council members.

Journal of Midas.name: Journal of Midas
Journal of Midas.description: Gain gold when defeating consecutive enemies without taking damage!

Kali's Flower Diadem.name: Kali's Flower Diadem
Kali's Flower Diadem.description: When taking damage that would defeat you, gain full signature charge and briefly become immune to defeat!

Large Red Button.name: Large Red Button
Large Red Button.description: Regain full health every time an exit portal is used! Max health is reduced and health potions have no effect.

Lei's Drum.name: Lei's Drum
Lei's Drum.description: Release a burst of lightning when taking damage!

Limited Edition Robe.name: Limited Edition Robe
Limited Edition Robe.description: Reduces damage taken to a maximum of 10% of max health!

Lotus Froststone.name: Lotus Froststone
Lotus Froststone.description: Summons an aura that freezes nearby enemies.

Memory Chainmail.name: Memory Chainmail
Memory Chainmail.description: Memorizes the last three attacks taken and reduces damage from attacks of the same type!

Merchant's Cart.name: Merchant's Cart
Merchant's Cart.description: Increase damage based on number of relics in inventory.

Messy Prescription.name: Messy Prescription
Messy Prescription.description: Increases healing received from all sources!

Mirror Shield.name: Mirror Shield
Mirror Shield.description: Summons a shield that reflects one projectile! Shield breaks after reflect and respawns on a timer.

Museum Ticket.name: Museum Ticket
Museum Ticket.description: A ticket to Lanova Museum's newly opened Chaos Trials exhibit!

Nerite Shell.name: Nerite Shell
Nerite Shell.description: Adds a chance to slow foes!

Neve's Citrine.name: Neve's Citrine
Neve's Citrine.description: Holding seven lightning arcana increases critical chance! All arcana shocks foes!

Neve's Emerald.name: Neve's Emerald
Neve's Emerald.description: Holding seven earth arcana increase health and armor and lowers stun and knockback!

Neve's Quartz.name: Neve's Quartz
Neve's Quartz.description: Holding seven air arcana increases movement speed and evasion. All arcana slows foes!

Neve's Ruby.name: Neve's Ruby
Neve's Ruby.description: Holding seven fire arcana increases damage! All arcana burns foes!

Neve's Sapphire.name: Neve's Sapphire
Neve's Sapphire.description: Holding seven water arcana reduces all cooldowns and increases healing!

Nocturnal Sundial.name: Nocturnal Sundial
Nocturnal Sundial.description: Adds a chance that an arcana will not go on cooldown after use!

Nog's Heavenly Boots.name: Nog's Heavenly Boots
Nog's Heavenly Boots.description: Adds a significant chance to evade attacks but take double damage!

Noxious Dappercap.name: Noxious Dappercap
Noxious Dappercap.description: Adds a chance to poison foes!

Ominous Loan Note.name: Ominous Loan Note
Ominous Loan Note.description: Immediately receive a large sum of gold! All gold gained, with interest, will go toward paying off this debt.

Overpriced Insurance.name: Overpriced Insurance
Overpriced Insurance.description: Expend all gold at the start of each stage and heal for a fraction of the expended amount.

Paronomasicon.name: Paronomasicon
Paronomasicon.description: Your attacks on council members are more pun-ishing! Enemy attacks pack an extra pun-ch.

Pathfinder's Knapsack.name: Pathfinder's Knapsack
Pathfinder's Knapsack.description: On clearing the floor, receive a heal based on the map reveal percentage.

Pathfinder's Map.name: Pathfinder's Map
Pathfinder's Map.description: Reveals the layout and main points of interest of the Chaos Trials!

Pazu's Favorite Hat.name: Pazu's Favorite Hat
Pazu's Favorite Hat.description: Revive with low health when defeated! Hat can also create health orbs when dropped. This relic is destroyed on use.

Perfect Time Crystal.name: Perfect Time Crystal
Perfect Time Crystal.description: Signature damage, charge rate, and decay rate increased!

Permafrost Cube.name: Permafrost Cube
Permafrost Cube.description: Adds a chance to freeze foes!

Phoenix Talon.name: Phoenix Talon
Phoenix Talon.description: Adds a chance to burn foes!

Phyyrnx's Hourglass.name: Phyyrnx's Hourglass
Phyyrnx's Hourglass.description: Designed by Artisan PerdyDarnSavvy, this relic activates when taking damage at low health and briefly removes the cooldown on all arcana!

Plaguing Sprite Dria.name: Plaguing Sprite Dria
Plaguing Sprite Dria.description: Summons a sprite that poisons enemies! Only one sprite can be active at any time.

Poem of Fiery Rime.name: Poem of Fiery Rime
Poem of Fiery Rime.description: Increases fire and ice damage! Adds a chance to freeze and burn foes to fire and ice arcana, respectively.

Pop-up Primer.name: Pop-up Primer
Pop-up Primer.description: Increases the number of summoned agents, but lowers their health!

Raffle Ticket.name: Raffle Ticket
Raffle Ticket.description: Adds a chance that an item purchased in the Chaos Trials will be free of charge.

Reactive Vinemail.name: Reactive Vinemail
Reactive Vinemail.description: Releases a grove of rooting vines when taking damage!

Regenerative Inkwell.name: Regenerative Inkwell
Regenerative Inkwell.description: Using a fully charged signature arcana heals you instead of producing a signature spell!

Reinforced Bracers.name: Reinforced Bracers
Reinforced Bracers.description: Your projectiles destroy any other projectiles they strike!

Relic Rewards Card.name: Relic Rewards Card
Relic Rewards Card.description: All gold costs for relics are discounted!

Renewing Potion Vial.name: Renewing Potion Vial
Renewing Potion Vial.description: Regain a small amount of health when teleporting to the next area!

Resolute Svalinn.name: Resolute Svalinn
Resolute Svalinn.description: Increases resistance to fire based attacks!

Ring of Recycling.name: Ring of Recycling
Ring of Recycling.description: Gain a shield every time a charged signature is not activated and times out.

Ring of Reserves.name: Ring of Reserves
Ring of Reserves.description: Adds more uses to all multi-use arcana!

Royal Flush.name: Royal Flush
Royal Flush.description: Equipping arcana of the same element increases damage!

Sano's Headband.name: Sano's Headband
Sano's Headband.description: You can no longer be interrupted while casting an arcana!

Scissors of Vitality.name: Scissors of Vitality
Scissors of Vitality.description: Sacrifice all standard arcana in your hand to revive from defeat!

Secret Wild Card.name: Secret Wild Card
Secret Wild Card.description: Your signature will take longer to charge, but can now be used twice on a single charge!

Sharpened Stylus.name: Sharpened Stylus
Sharpened Stylus.description: Increases damage but signature can no longer be charged!

Sidewinder's Badge.name: Sidewinder's Badge
Sidewinder's Badge.description: All melee basic arcana have a secondary hit that deals reduced damage!

Silver Spinning Top.name: Silver Spinning Top
Silver Spinning Top.description: Increases the activation speed of arcana but slows movement speed!

Singing Bowl.name: Singing Bowl
Singing Bowl.description: Not using arcana for a short period of time causes your next spell to be a critical hit!

Sinister Ledger.name: Sinister Ledger
Sinister Ledger.description: Designed by Artisan Steven Wu, this relic increases all damage for every enemy defeated, but loses effectiveness when taking damage.

Sleepy Thunderstone.name: Sleepy Thunderstone
Sleepy Thunderstone.description: Summons an aura that calls down lightning on nearby enemies.

Sparking Sprite Etra.name: Sparking Sprite Etra
Sparking Sprite Etra.description: Summons a sprite that shocks enemies! Only one sprite can be active at any time.

Special Snowflake.name: Special Snowflake
Special Snowflake.description: Defeated enemies have a chance to explode and freeze nearby enemies!

Spell Thief's Socks.name: Spell Thief's Socks
Spell Thief's Socks.description: Increase movement speed everytime an arcana is used! Speed is increased for each arcana on cooldown!

Spice Rack.name: Spice Rack
Spice Rack.description: Using an arcana of a different element reduces the cooldown of the previously used arcana.

Spiked Emergency Kit.name: Spiked Emergency Kit
Spiked Emergency Kit.description: Regenerate health while at critically low health! Max health is reduced.

Stanza of Flames.name: Stanza of Flames
Stanza of Flames.description: All fire arcana cause burning but take double damage from water spells! Second half of the Poem of Fiery Rime.

Stanza of Frost.name: Stanza of Frost
Stanza of Frost.description: Increases ice damage! First half of the Poem of Fiery Rime.

Stygian Turtle Shell.name: Stygian Turtle Shell
Stygian Turtle Shell.description: Briefly become invulnerable after taking damage in quick succession!

Super Carrot Cake.name: Super Carrot Cake
Super Carrot Cake.description: Taking damage increases your max health up to a certain limit!

Supply Crate.name: Supply Crate
Supply Crate.description: The relic and arcana stores will instantly restock after purchase! Health potions are of short supply and will not be restocked.

Surefire Rocket.name: Surefire Rocket
Surefire Rocket.description: Signature charge no longer decays while building up!

Takeout Box.name: Takeout Box
Takeout Box.description: When healed for more than your maximum health, gain a shield equal to half of the excess heal amount.

Tapping Gloves.name: Tapping Gloves
Tapping Gloves.description: Following up a basic arcana with another arcana increases its critical hit chance!

Tea of Mercy.name: Tea of Mercy
Tea of Mercy.description: All heals increase your max health up to a certain limit!

Tesla Coil.name: Tesla Coil
Tesla Coil.description: Adds a chance to shock foes!

Thesis on Defense.name: Thesis on Defense
Thesis on Defense.description: Every point of damage taken adds a page to this thesis. Every 200 pages reduces all damage taken by 1. (Maximum 1000 pages)

Three Gorges Bulwark.name: Three Gorges Bulwark
Three Gorges Bulwark.description: Increases resistance to water based attacks!

Tiny Crocodile Heart.name: Tiny Crocodile Heart
Tiny Crocodile Heart.description: Reduces max health but increases max health for each enemy defeated!

Tozy's Pocket Watch.name: Tozy's Pocket Watch
Tozy's Pocket Watch.description: Designed by Artisan Curt 'Tozy' Toczydlowski, this relic reduces cooldowns but also reduces signature charge rate!

Tracking Suit.name: Tracking Suit
Tracking Suit.description: Arcana of matching elements increases resistance to that element! Requires two or more arcana of the same element.

Vampire's Eyeglasses.name: Vampire's Eyeglasses
Vampire's Eyeglasses.description: Regenerate health every time you land a critical hit!

Vampire's Fangs.name: Vampire's Fangs
Vampire's Fangs.description: Defeating enemies regenerates health but max health is reduced!

Volatile Gemstone.name: Volatile Gemstone
Volatile Gemstone.description: Signature charge rate and decay are increased dramatically but charged signature damage is reduced! Shell of the Perfect Time Crystal.

Wallet of Vigor.name: Wallet of Vigor
Wallet of Vigor.description: Enables you to purchase items with health when you don't have sufficient gold.

Wanderer's Mechanism.name: Wanderer's Mechanism
Wanderer's Mechanism.description: Increases the damage of your signature arcana! Core of the Perfect Time Crystal.

Whimsical Explodium.name: Whimsical Explodium
Whimsical Explodium.description: Adds a chance that enemies will explode when defeated!

Yuna's Storybook.name: Yuna's Storybook
Yuna's Storybook.description: Increases the duration of summoned agents!
